If you want to play multiplayer follow these steps and remember that this fix is working only on Update 7.

1. Copy the content of included [MP.Update.7.Steamworks.Fix-RVTFiX] folder into your game folder. Ãƒâ€º
2. Start Steam and login with your (fake) account. It's reccomended to use a "fake" account to play cracked games.
3. Start the game from HowToSurvive.exe
4. When you're in-game, go to "Online Game".
- HOST: Host a game and send invite to your friend.
- CLIENT: Accept invite.
5. Play & Enjoy!

*If after this you want to play as SP only (without steam) just recopy the files from [SP.Crack] into the main folder.
